description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com
Chris Heilmann - Program Manager for Developer Outreach at the Microsoft Edge team

ABSTRACT
Latest changes in the market and a new set of web technologies allows us now to slim down and deliver experiences for our users native environments can not match. In this talk Chris Heilmann of Microsoft shows you how you can be part of this takeover and what it means for our already existing projects. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7715

https://twitter.com/gotocph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
title: GOTO 2016 • Progressive Web Apps - the Return of the Web? • Chris Heilmann
